title: "[Improvement] <summary>"

## Summary

- **What should change?**
- **Why is this needed now?**

## Proposed Solution

- Outline of changes or steps
- Impacted files or directories
- Dependencies or follow-up tasks

## Alternatives Considered

- Other approaches evaluated
- Trade-offs or reasons they were not chosen

## Risks & Mitigations

- Potential blockers or concerns
- Mitigation strategies or validation plans

## Additional Context

- Related issues / discussions
- Screenshots, diagrams, or mockups (optional)
- Links to research findings or external references

> After discussion, convert approved proposals into tasks or bounties as appropriate.
